message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. Would you like to purchase it for $150?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Could we discuss a price closer to $100?
I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob, but I have to make a profit. I can meet you halfway at $125. Would you be willing to consider that?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. How about we aim for $110 instead?
I'm glad we're making progress, Bob. I can do $120, which is the lowest I can go. This is my final offer, so if you're interested, let me know!
